page.title: 04Local Issues in Monmouth
page.content: The Vauxhall{Army Training Camp}is to be closed with the loss of 1,400 army trainees who pass through the camp each year. It is thought this will have a disastrous effect on{trade in the town.The camp also provides the venue for the annual show. Grant-aid status for new industries has been withdrawn and it is feared that no new jobs will be forthcoming and{unemployment}remain high. Insufficient{car parking}facilities especially in the tourist season. The use of concrete in the restoration of{Over-Monnow Gate House, distasteful to conservationists. The poor maintenance of the{Charles {Rolls statue. Lack of{playing areas}especially in villages.
